question.text: Before you make a U-turn in the road, you should

explanation.text: If you want to make a U-turn, slow down and ensure that the road is clear in both directions. Make sure that the road is wide enough to carry out the manoeuvre safely.

answer.text: give an arm signal as well as using your indicators
signal so that other drivers can slow down for you
look over your shoulder for a final check
select a higher gear than normal
